body_html:
TensorFlow should not include the paths like that. It should be like "third_party/gpus/cuda/include/...".

So it is possible that those headers are implicitly included by nvcc. But I cannot reproduce this problem with my local bazel 2.0. My guess is that the newer bazel checks those include dependencies differently.

body:
TensorFlow should not include the paths like that. It should be like "third_party/gpus/cuda/include/...". 

So it is possible that those headers are implicitly included by nvcc. But I cannot reproduce this problem with my local bazel 2.0. My guess is that the newer bazel checks those include dependencies differently.
